channel.title: CVE Feed for SNOW -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SNOW -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-41562|2024-08-04T03:15:29.084Z -- snow -- snow%20agent%20for%20windows
item.description: A vulnerability in Snow Snow Agent for Windows allows a non-admin user to cause arbitrary deletion of files. This issue affects: Snow Snow Agent for Windows version 5.0.0 to 6.7.1 on Windows.
